name: Internet Queens
title: Highest Female Internet Usage
description: In 2023, 100% of the female population in Kuwait used the internet, showcasing the highest female internet usage globally.

name: Water Woes
title: Extreme Water Stress
description: Kuwait faces extreme water stress with freshwater withdrawals at 3850.5% of available resources in 2021, indicating a critical water scarcity situation.

name: Sanitation Success
title: Universal Sanitation Access
description: In 2022, 100% of Kuwait's population had access to safely managed sanitation services, reflecting excellent public health infrastructure.

name: Currency Stability
title: Stable Exchange Rate
description: Kuwait maintains a stable currency with an official exchange rate of 0.3067 LCU per US$ in 2024, ensuring economic predictability.

name: Economic Powerhouse
title: Strong Current Account Balance
description: In 2023, Kuwait's current account balance was 31.4% of GDP, highlighting its robust economic position on the global stage.

name: Tax Troubles
title: Negative Tax Balance
description: Kuwait experienced a negative balance of -$10.7 billion in taxes less subsidies on products in 2023, indicating fiscal challenges.

name: Youthful Workforce
title: Young Male Population
description: In 2023, 4.2% of Kuwait's male population was aged 20-24, contributing to a dynamic and youthful workforce.

name: Mature Demographics
title: Middle-Aged Male Dominance
description: In 2023, 13% of Kuwait's male population was aged 40-44, indicating a mature demographic profile.

name: Female Employment Security
title: Low Female Vulnerable Employment
description: In 2023, only 0.02% of female employment in Kuwait was considered vulnerable, reflecting strong job security for women.
